sourcesContent: function t(){return t=>t.addInitializer((t=>new r(t)))}class r{constructor(t){this.host=t,this.host.addController(this)}get currentAnchor(){return"A"===this.host.parentElement?.tagName?this.host.parentElement:null}hostConnected(){this.setAnchor()}hostUpdated(){this.setAnchor()}setAnchor(){this.currentAnchor&&this.currentAnchor!==this.previousAnchor&&(this.previousAnchor=this.currentAnchor,this.host.readonly=!0,this.currentAnchor.style.lineHeight="0",this.currentAnchor.style.textDecoration="none")}}export{r as ButtonAnchorController,t as buttonAnchor};
